description: This file defines a script that sets up an agent to interact with the Stripe API via the Model Context Protocol (MCP). It includes functions to initialize the agent with specific tools and instructions, and runs an example task related to creating Stripe objects like products, prices, and payment links.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured to interact with Stripe via MCP tools.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: Provides tools to interact with the MCP protocol for Stripe API operations.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Sets up and runs the Stripe MCP agent with a given message, handling environment setup and exceptions.
